Package com.example.lottos

package com.example.lottos
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CreateEventScreen
    This fragment is the main fragment that allows organizers to create new events.
    EditEventScreen
    This fragment allows organizers to view, edit, and delete existing events.
    EditProfileScreen
    This fragment is the main fragment that lets a user view and update their profile information.
    Entrant
     
    EntrantEventsScreen
    This fragment is the main fragment that displays all open events for entrants.
    EntrantWaitListsScreen
    This fragment is the main fragment that displays all events the entrant has joined waitlists for.
    Event
    Represents an event within the Lottos application.
    EventDetailsScreen
    Fragment that displays detailed information for a specific event.
    EventHistoryScreen
    this fragment displays the entrant user's event history.
    EventInfo
     
    EventList
    This is a class that keeps a list of Event objects
    EventTest
    Unit tests for the Event class.
    EventTime
     
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    HomeScreen
    Fragment representing the main home screen of the app.
    LoginScreen
    Fragment that handles user login functionality.
    LotteryInfoScreen
    Fragment that displays information about how the lottery system works.
    LotterySystem
    Class that performs lottery selection based on a string seed.
    MainActivity
    The main activity of the application that hosts all fragments and manages navigation.
    NotificationScreen
    Fragment that displays user notifications.
    Organizer
     
    OrganizerEventsScreen
    This fragment that displays all events created by a specific organizer.
    ProfileScreen
    This fragment that displays and manages the current user's profile.
    SendNotificationScreen
    This fragment allows organizers to send custom notifications to groups of users associated with their events.
    SignupScreen
    This fragment handles new user registration.
    User
     
    UserInfo
     
    UserInfoTest
     
    UserList
    This is a class that keeps a list of User objects
    UserTest
     
    WaitList
    model class representing a waitlist for an event.
    WelcomeScreen
    This fragment that displays the initial welcome screen for the app.
